Content: It is reported that the beach extending from Dehiwala to Mount Lavinia has been polluted by oil. It is also reported that a later of black coloured oil was visible in the sea as well. General Manager of the Marine Environment Protection Authority Doctor Turney Pradeep Kumara said that they suspect that a vessel had illegally released oil to the ocean.
